text: (Those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an, (and have left their homes) migrating from Mecca to Medina (and striven with their wealth and their lives) by spending their wealth and sacrificing their lives (in Allah's way) in obedience of Allah (are of much greater worth) have much greater merit (in Allah's sight) than others. (These are they who are triumphant) they have gained Paradise and been saved from hell.
